original_text: Ahaz also took the silver and gold that was found in the house of the Lord and in the treasures of the king's house and sent a present to the king of Assyria.
korean_text: 아하스가 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 곳간에 있는 은금을 내어다가 앗수르 왕에게 예물로 보냈더니

sentences.original_text: Ahaz also took the silver and gold
that was found in the house of the Lord
and in the treasures of the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 집 보물 창고에서 발견된 것들을

sentences.original_text: and sent a present to the king of Assyria.
